§6§lOn the Development of the Intersection of a Plane with a Polytope§r

§8§oJoseph O'Rourke§r

§72006§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o11 pages, 8 figures. Earlier version replaced after I discovered Schur's 1921 theorem, whose proof can be followed to establish the key generalization of Cauchy's arm lemma, my Theorem 1. Paper revised accordingly.
New (2006) version corrects two errors in the proofs found by Raghavan Dhandapani\u00a7r
